Located in the heart of the Cape Winelands, Val de Vie Estate encapsulates relaxed luxury and comfortable family living.

Gallery

DEVELOPMENT COMPONENTS

The Vines

The Vines is all about a unique lifestyle, incredible facilities, state-of-the-art security, and exquisite natural surroundings are an invitation to living with open doors.

Gentleman's Estate

Offering a sense of space and proximity to nature.

La Vue

Val de Vie investments has launched new developer plots overlooking the new fynbos reservation area.

Le Domaine

The Vines at Le Domaine, 72 stands that offer views of Paarl and majestic Simonsberg Mtns. True to Val de Vie's core values this development fulfil your desire for a beautiful and contemporary home.

The River Club

Modern luxury and untouched nature meet in perfect harmony to create what could be your future home, at The River Club on Val de Vie Estate. An atmosphere of complete serenity each time you come home.

The Polo Village

The Polo Village Apartments are elegantly designed by award-winning architect Stefan Antoni, unrestricted, uncluttered and gracefully mimicking the tranquility of the surrounding landscape.

The Polo Village Offices

Welcome to a new way of doing business at the Polo Village Offices. The Polo Village Offices are designed by Boogertman & Partners and inspired by the Stefan Antoni designed Polo Village Apartments.

La Vue II
The Reserve

1 Acre to 1 Hectare lifestyle stands bordering on the protected Fynbos Reserve.
